title: Bell Pull, 1943-46-69-a/c, 19th century
medium:
embroidered in silk, wool, and metal thread on linen canvas, brass handle, cotton plain cloth
Embroidery: counted stitches
dimensions: Overall: 194 x 11.2 cm (6 ft. 4 3/8 in. x 4 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Bell pull made of canvas with embroidery, arranged as cross borders, in floral and geometric designs (one with initials "A. W." and date "1752"); brass handle at either end, pierced in design of Chinese type.  Embroidery in canvas stitches.  Bell pull is backed with yellow cotton plain cloth.
